text: Alfred-Isaac Pereire (30 January 1879, Paris – 28 November 1957, Paris, aged 78) was a 20th-century French historian and bibliographer. == Biography == Ths son of Gustave Pereire and grandson of Isaac Pereire, he was drafted during World War I from 1914 to 1918. Founder and general secretary of the Société des amis de la Bibliothèque nationale de France, he organized several exhibitions at the Bibliothèque nationale.
